_comment: Example configuration for VOLUME mode (Unity Catalog Volumes)
_description: Use for file-based testing with pre-synced CDC data
_note: Mode suffix '_volume' will be automatically appended to pipeline_name and schema
_notes: Volume path will be constructed as: /Volumes/{catalog}/{schema}/{volume_name}
Ensure volume is populated using sync_azure_to_volume_compact.py before deployment
Volume should contain timestamped directories with parquet/json files
